title: Handle a New Client Intake Call
description: A potential client calls the firm for the first time. The intake specialist needs to gather initial information.

tasks.description: Gather basic information from the caller: name, contact information, and a brief description of their legal issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the initial intake form.

tasks.description: Identify the names of all other parties involved in the potential matter for a conflicts check.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the names of all adverse parties.

tasks.description: Determine which practice area the matter falls into and schedule a consultation with an appropriate attorney.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly routes the potential client and schedules a meeting.
